text:
RT @_Kim_Jongun: My clothes don't fit anymore.

There's only one possibly explanation.

America is shrinking my clothes.

When I heard about the 2nd Death Star, I said something smelled fishy

Right then Admiral Ackbar walked in

I had to meet with HR after that

Obi-wan said my dad killed my mom.

Then again, he also said my dad killed my dad.

One time the blue milk went bad.

He said my dad did it.

To be a Jedi, I had to swear off women.

And give up like half of all human emotions.

But now I can levitate rocks

So, yeah, there's that.

Girl, are you a dead tauntaun?

Because you make me feel all warm inside.

That’s what I’d say if I ever met a woman.

No wonder I’m alone.

Remember that time I saved the day and got the girl and lived happily ever after?

No, you don't.

It's never happened.

And it never will.

I set up a Tinder account.

My nearest match is 600 trillion miles away.

I hope she drives because I don't anymore.

The Force guides all things.

I trusted the Force to lead me to my soul mate.

The Force led me to an island by myself.

Fuck the Force.

I wrote a haiku about my day:

I stare at the sea.
It is boring like always.
I don't have Netflix.

I'm starting a softball league.

I just need 8 more players for my team.

And then all the other players for all the other teams.

I'll wait

Deep down, I know these rocks care about me.

Even though outwardly they never give me any signs of love or support.

Just like my dad.

I don't always stare at the ocean.

Sometime I gaze at it.

Or even peer at it intently.

I lead a rich and full life.

Way to kill all the padawans, Kylo Ren.

No one has ever thought of that before.

Your only Dark Side power is plagiarism.

One time I asked Leia how her date with Han went.

She said, "Let's just say he shot first."

I can never unhear that.

Han was frozen in Jabba's palace for months

I said I needed time to make a plan

Really I just wanted a break from him

He's kind of a dick

My last crush turned out to be my sister.

There are plenty of other fish in the sea.

But exactly zero women.

I hate this planet.

My relationship with my dad was pretty straightforward.

Every time I met him, he tried to kill me.

He wasn't one for mixed signals.

The worst thing about being on this island is there are no people.

The best thing about being on this island is there are no people.

Kylo Ren used to whine that Han was too strict.

Whatever.

My dad believed "spare the rod, spoil the child"

Only his rod was a lightsaber.

One time I fought a vision of my dad in a cave.

I'm not sure what it was supposed to teach me

Afterward Yoda banned me from taking shrooms

I miss my friends and family more than anything in the galaxy.

Except tacos.

I'd sell my soul to the Dark Side for tacos.

Before I left, I told Leia I would miss her.

All she said was, "I know."

Han laughed.

He ruined that woman.

I did an awesome job staring at the ocean today.

There was no one around to appreciate it.

I gave myself a high-five.

My hand fell off.
Relationship status: The last woman I was inside of was a tauntaun.

I was so mad when Yoda lifted my X-wing

He could've moved it anytime he wanted

He let it soak in the swamp for days

It ruined the leather

One time I told Kylo Ren to get a haircut.

That's when he killed all the padawans.

That kid has anger issues.

When I told Leia I was leaving, she called me a coward.

I gave my hand for the cause.

What did she ever give?

She said her entire planet.

I don't miss my old friends.

With Han, everything was always about him.

Now I only hang out with rocks.

At least they're good listeners.
I felt a great disturbance in the Force, as if millions of Panthers fans suddenly cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced.

I'm kind of glad my dad didn't raise me and Leia.

All he ever did was work.

I doubt the Death Star had a good daycare.

Leia used to brag that she was super popular as a kid.

She even said she was prom queen.

Funny how all the evidence blew up on Alderaan.

Being a moisture farmer wasn't so bad.

Except on those rare occasions when it rained.

That flooded the market.

Get it?

God, I'm lonely.

Obi-wan could show up here any time as a ghost.

So could Yoda.

Or my dad.

Yet they don't.

Even the dead are too busy to hang out with me

Han and Leia said they divorced because Kylo Ren went to the Dark Side.

But really they got into a huge fight assembling IKEA furniture.

It's the weekend.

Time to kick back, relax, and stare at the ocean.

Just like every other day of the week.

I don't always stare at the ocean.

Sometimes it gets dark.

Then I stare at blackness.

Leia said I was a little short for a stormtrooper.

That cut me deep.

I've been wearing platform shoes under my robes ever since.

Whenever the galaxy is in its darkest hour, you can always count on a true Jedi to do one thing:

Run away and hide for the rest of his life
My Facebook Friends Day video was just a bunch of selfies.

One time Han said, "Laugh It Up, Fuzzball," to Leia.

It was when she forgot to bleach her mustache.

I had to fly him to the emergency room
Throwback Thursday: I used to have friends.

I saw a hideous sea creature

It was ugly and bloated and covered in fur

Then I realized it was my reflection in the water

I should shave

Han was frozen in carbonite for a long time.

Leia cried a lot.

I covered the entire Millennium Falcon in Post-it notes.

He was so pissed.

I've been keeping a journal for 20 years.

I write down every interesting thing that happens to me on this island.

It's completely blank.

I've seen too many good men die young.

Then there's Han.

That dick has escaped death countless times.

He'll probably live forever.

I didn't feel like getting out of bed.

Then I remembered I don't have a bed.

I sleep on rocks.

I didn't feel like getting off my rocks.

How am I not losing weight?

All I eat is moss.

I bet it has loads of carbs.

I should switch to diet moss.

Why did my dad want to rule the galaxy?

He never spent money & only owned 1 outfit

What good would power do?

Maybe he'd buy a beach house

"Get out of my way. Don't you know who I am?"

He doesn't move.

"I blew up a Death Star."

The rock is unimpressed.

I walk around him.

Hey, the Force.

It's me, Luke.

I'm so lonely.

Please give me someone to fall in love with.

And please warn me this time if we're related

I'm the only one here.

That means I'm the sexiest man on the planet.

And the ugliest.

Now I feel terrible.

One time I had a hangnail.

I tried to cut it off with my lightsaber.

And that's the real story of why I have a robotic hand.

"I AM your father," I say to the rock.

The rock doesn't believe me.

I move to cut off his hand.

He doesn't have one.

Damn he's clever.

Rocks are better than friends.

They're steady and quiet and reliable.

And if I dump them in the ocean, I don't have to lie to the police.

I came here to find the first Jedi temple

Sometimes I worry that I spent 20 years stranded on the wrong planet

That would be embarrassing.

Leia used to complain she never had any free time

She spent half her day putting her hair in those buns

God forbid she just do a ponytail.

When I announced I was running away forever to be a hermit, I expected my friends to stop me

They just shrugged

That plan really backfired

I'm not scared of the dark.

But this rock is.

I leave my lightsaber on as a night light so he feels better.

Not every day is the same.

Today I found a new type of moss.

It turned out to be the old type of moss covered in extra dirt.

It tasted OK

Yoda told me I was too old to be a Jedi.

It made me insecure about my age.

Words can hurt.

Even backwards ones.

I would never have a kid without getting married first.

My dad was raised by a single mother.

It didn't turn out so well.

My dad cut off my hand.

I don't think he meant it, though.

We always hurt the ones we love.

This is my favorite rock.

His name is Dan.

I love him more than all the others.

Wait, this is Rick.

Awkward.

I told myself I was only going to stay on this island until I took one selfie that I actually looked good in.

It’s been 20 years.

I've been gone a long time, but I'll never forget my friends.

Like that one girl.

And that guy.

You know. The one with the hair.

Being a hermit means I'll never have to share my French fries.

It also means I'll never have French fries.

I've made a terrible mistake.

Don't talk to me until I've had my coffee.

There's no coffee on this entire planet.

There's also no one to talk to me.

God, I'm lonely.

I told everyone exactly where I was going.

I even invited them to my house warming party.

I think they lost my address on purpose.

R2-D2 was hurt when I ran away to become a hermit.

The night after we bought him, he ran away from me.

Payback's a bitch.

Fool me once, shame on you.

Fool me twice, shame on you again.

Do I have any other family members you're lying about, Obi-wan?

A rock that annoyed me rolled down 400 stairs.

I had nothing to do with it.

He tripped. I swear.

Every true Jedi must master two essential skills:

1) running from your problems

2) avoiding people

I'm good at fighting with a lightsaber

But I'm GREAT at causing awkward silences

I didn't choose the hermit life

The hermit life chose me

The first Jedi didn't mind the hundreds of stairs here.

They never walked up them.

They made the padawans give them piggyback rides.

The emperor made my dad and me fight to the death to see who would be his apprentice.

It was the worst job interview I've ever had.

I saw Leia in a gold bikini BEFORE I knew she was my sister.

There are definitely some times when I was alone that I wish I could take back

"Who wants to play some badminton?" I ask out loud.

The rocks don't reply.

I set up this net for nothing.

Is anyone actually surprised I'm still single?

Just look at how my dad's last relationship turned out.

I know it wasn't my fault my parents split up.

I wasn't even born yet.

I blame Leia.

After all these years, there's one question that still haunts me.

Do I look better with or without a beard?

It's too late to ask anyone.

I turn around dramatically.

There's nobody there.

I'll check again soon.

Just like I've done every few minutes for the last 20 years.

I'm not actually as lonely as I look.

I'm much, much lonelier.

When I blew up the Death Star I got a useless medal

There was no pay raise

They said we'd discuss it again if I blew up another Death Star

If I were ever a third wheel, I'd be like "I'm so happy there are two other wheels."

I hate being a unicycle.

I look at the ocean all day.

Every day.

For years at a time.

Just once, I wish the ocean would look at me.

The Jedi order doesn't require me to cover my head with a hood.

I wear one every day anyway.

I'm way too busy to comb my hair.

I saw a rainbow.

It's a sign that happiness and friendship are just around the corner.

I waited all day.

Rainbows lie.

I tested the range of my levitation powers today.

I reached toward space and concentrated.

But try as I might, I couldn't summon a pizza.

The worst part about flying with R2-D2 was definitely fighting over the radio station.

That little droid sure did love gangster rap.

I had a great time at the ewok victory feast.

Until I asked where all the food came from.

There was a lot of empty stormtrooper armor.

I set my cup of water on the rock without a coaster

It leaves a ring

Leia isn't here to yell at me

I am a free man

I wipe off the ring

I don't get why shooting lightning is only a Dark Side power

It has plenty of legitimate uses

I could use it to cook s'mores or something.

A teenager once asked me if I had swag.

I said, "Kid, I blew up a Death Star."

He stared at me blankly.

That's when I ran away forever.

Chewbacca never tore anybody's arms off.

We let him win because we felt bad for him.

He couldn't even talk.

This is my 600th tweet.

I sure have a lot to say for someone who has no one to talk to.

Uncle Owen didn't let me go to the Imperial Academy

Maybe it's for the best

My friends who did go are still paying off their student loans

"Join me of your own free will," my dad said at our final showdown. "I won't FORCE you."

Then he paused

He actually waited for me to laugh

A boulder broke off a cliff and smashed into some boulders below.

I couldn't watch

This rock on rock violence is tearing this island apart

I wanted to bond with my dad.

He said we could conquer the galaxy together.

I was hoping for a fishing trip.

My to-do list for today:

1) Stare at the ocean.

Looks like I overbooked myself again.

The Rebels didn't train me to fly an X-wing.

Or do a background check.

They just handed me a war machine and said, "Have fun."

I had fun.

One time I told Leia we were actually triplets.

She got really excited

Then I told her the third kid is Chewbacca

He looks just like her.

R2-D2 turned his half of the map into a fancy hologram.

That's not what I gave him

I drew the real map in crayon on a restaurant placemat.

I picked this island for the moss

There's enough for every meal

Every day

Forever

I should've picked an island covered in cheeseburgers

I tell the rocks my secrets.

They keep them forever.

Except that rock.

That rock gossips.

I throw him into the ocean.

I do 100 push-ups every morning.

But I'm old, so I use the Force.

My mind is so ripped.

When Kylo Ren was little, he asked me how I lost my hand.

I said, "Running with Scissors."

He was afraid of arts and crafts after that.

The emperor tried to kill me in the flashiest way possible

He did it for the shock value

That joke would be funny if he didn't kill my dad

I used to get Han the same gift every year.

Lint rollers.

Boxes of them.

Secretly, he hated flying with Chewbacca.

I'm not truly alone.

I sense other life forms deep within the ocean.

I reach out to them with the Force.

Nothing answers.

Fish are dicks

Hoth wasn't my choice for a base

But Leia thought we could flip that icy dump for a profit

We wasted so much money on granite countertops

One time we threw a surprise party for Admiral Ackbar.

He screamed, "It's a trap!"

He never stopped screaming.

He's in a psych ward now.

A beautiful butterfly drifted by in the cool breeze.

The sudden motion startled me.

I killed it with my lightsaber.

My dad didn't seem that surprised to find out he had 2 kids

I wonder if I have any other siblings

The Force is no substitute for a condom.

When I feel lonely, I look up at the moon.

I think of all the people seeing what I'm seeing.

All 0 of them.

Then I feel 100 times worse.

Living alone has one perk.

I can drink milk straight from the jug.

Or at least I could if I had milk.

Which I don't.

Fuck.

It's a good thing I wear this long, flowing robe.

I walk up hundreds of stairs a day.

My calves are distractingly sexy.

I wore a black turtleneck to my final showdown with Dad

He thought that meant I was leaning toward the Dark Side

But my neck was just cold

Obi-wan was a sad old man on Tatooine.

All he did all day was yell at Tusken Raiders to stay off his lawn.

I wish I had someone to yell at

I twisted my ankle on a rock in the middle of the night.

Now I'm afraid to walk around in the dark.

This used to be a good neighborhood.

I don't think my dad was really conceived by midichlorians.

My grandma made that up so she didn't have to teach him about sex.

That rock wasn't there yesterday.

Someone moved it.

Someone else is here!

Wait, I moved it.

No one else is here.

Damn that rock.

My deal breakers for a relationship:

1) being related to me

That's pretty much it.

My father did some truly awful, despicable things.

Then again, who am I to judge?

I made it to first base with my sister.

Obi-wan ran away & became a hermit

Yoda ran away & became a hermit

My dad left & became a Sith

I come from a long, proud line of quitters

Obi-wan used to rant about “sand people.”

I told him not to call them that.

That’s their word.

He didn’t understand.

Old people never do

Obi-wan basically let Vader kill him.

Not a great plan, bro.

You weren't more powerful as a ghost.

Living people can give advice, too.

Sometimes I think I talk too much.

My dad was the strong, silent type.

Other than the wheezing.

God, he was annoying.

Why do I stare at the ocean all day?

Because it’s blue.

Just like me.

I only met my dad a few times.

All he wanted to talk about was me joining the family business.

He always put work before me.

I have 300,000 followers.

I told all the rocks.

They didn't care, either.

Han used to keep his house so cold

He wouldn't let Kylo Ren touch the thermostat

"I was on Hoth," Han always said. "Put on a damn sweater"

Maybe it's for the best that I never got a dog.

The last time I played with someone's pet, I crushed its head under a giant steel door.

Staring at the ocean all this time made me realize something important.

I should have brought sunglasses.

I've been squinting for 20 years

I wish I could finger paint, @TheWookieeRoars and @KyloR3n.

But it's kind of hard without paint.

Or 10 real fingers.

Han and Leia made me an usher at their wedding.

I asked how I would know where to seat people.

Han said, “Use the Force."

I hate that guy

The emperor offered me the whole galaxy if I joined the Dark Side

I said no

He should have thrown in his chair

It swiveled and everything

The Force told me my dad was on a spaceship miles away but not that my sister had her tongue down my throat.

The family alerts need work.

Jedi isn't a bad religion.

No church on Sundays, and I can move stuff with my mind.

The "no sex ever" policy is kind of a bummer, though.

Lando blew up the Second Death Star.

The emperor would have died anyway.

I failed to save my dad's life.

I should have just stayed home.

Growing up on Tatooine was rough.

2 suns

0 fathers

When I told Leia I was leaving, she said I was never there for our family.

But when Dad was dying, where was she?

Playing with teddy bears

Have you ever put your hand up for a high-five and then remembered the nearest person is 600 trillion miles away?

Oh.

Me neither.

Milk isn't supposed to be blue.

I know that now.

Aunt Beru never checked the expiration date.

Today I stared at the ocean

Then stared at a rock

Then stared at the ocean again

I've got to cut back

This hectic schedule is killing me

I could never sense Han with the Force.

But I could always smell him coming.

That carbonite odor never really went away.

Han and Leia had a lot of trouble conceiving Kylo Ren.

Han was frozen in carbonite for over a year.

There was some freezer burn.

I'm not surprised Kylo Ren went to the Dark Side

I told Han and Leia that he needed a brother or sister

Only children never turn out right

After Han and Leia said their vows, Leia said, "I love you."

Han said, "I know."

Everyone laughed.

Those two make me sick.

I thought I would be Kylo Ren's godfather

Instead Han & Leia picked Chewbacca

Why does everyone like that guy?

He doesn't even wear pants

Yoda acted like a hero when he lifted my X-wing out of the swamp.

Water ruins engines.

It took me hours to rebuild it.

Yoda took a nap.

People think the Millennium Falcon was so cool

It was garbage

The bathroom didn't even work

When someone had to pee, they opened a window

I have no job.

No house.

No transportation.

And no girlfriend.

I'm lucky my parents are dead.

At least now I can't disappoint them.

I found a stick.

There are no trees on this planet.

Where did it come from?

WHERE DID IT COME FROM?

Never mind

It's a long, skinny rock

I blew up my X-wing so I would be a hermit forever.

But if my insurance agent asks, I hit a deer.

I thought Obi-wan was a crazy space wizard when he knew Alderaan blew up

Turns out he got an alert on his phone

His Force power was Google

When I die, I hope I don't become a Force ghost.

Then I'll have to hang out with Yoda.

I'm sick of giving that asshole piggyback rides.

Sometimes the Force lets me see into the future.

Like I know it's going to rain tomorrow

So I can change my plans

God, I wish I had plans

First Han said he shot first.

Then he said he didn't.

His story changed all the time.

I can't believe that guy is banging my sister.

"What's an example of inappropriate workplace PDA?" the rebel HR lady asked.

Han's hand shot up.

"Kissing your sister."

That's why I left

The most difficult thing about being a hermit is the lack of recognition.

I deserve a plaque or something

I'm hermitting so hard right now

I wish this moss I've been eating for years came with a nutritional label.

It's probably full of gluten.

It's amazing I'm not dead yet.

Leia called Han a scruffy-looking nerf herder.

Han shrugged it off

Later I walked in on him crying about it

It was awkward for both of us

Do rocks have names?

I've been calling this one "Hey, you" for 20 years.

Now it's too awkward to ask.

I'm tired of looking at this gosh darn ocean!

Sorry.

I shouldn't have lost control like that.

I have too much of my father in me.

My dad offered me a job working for him.

I turned him down.

The pay was good, but the Sith retirement plan was awful.

It gets cold here at night.

I have the Force to keep me warm.

It doesn't work at all.

I'd trade all my Jedi powers for one blanket.

How is it my fault that my student went to the Dark Side?

Don't blame the teacher.

Blame the Common Core Jedi curriculum.

Staring at the waves all day inspired me to write this haiku:

I hate you, ocean.
You are too wet for my taste.
Now I have to pee.

I had a three course dinner:

A moss appetizer.

Moss for an entry.

Moss for dessert.

Control your jealousy.

It leads to the Dark Side.

Leia used to brag she's never been tempted by the Dark Side.

Vader didn't want her.

That's like bragging she got picked last in dodgeball.

My father killed all the Jedi

In his defense, the Jedi made him wear a stupid braided ponytail for years

Everyone has their breaking point

I know what Leia will do if she finds me.

She'll hug me

Then yell at me for leaving

Then nag me to help with chores

I should hide better

I got a late start staring at the ocean

I slept through my alarm

That's my third strike

I'm dreading my annual hermit performance review.

I thought they were my friends.

But these rocks have been giving me the silent treatment for years.

They make terrible frenemies.

The only item I regret leaving behind is my tweezers.

A unibrow leads down the path to the Dark Side.

Staring at the ocean all day isn't as easy as it looks.

One time a piece of dirt blew in my eye.

I still have nightmares.

I'm 580 trillion miles from the nearest human.

That's 100 light years.

Or 30 seconds for a ship with a hyperdrive.

Still no one visits me

If I need to pick up something, I always use the Force.

I’m not showing off.

I just have a bad back.

You try sleeping on a pile of rocks.

I have an evil twin.

He has a stupid beard and dirty robes.

I only see him when I look in water that's very still.

I think he's a mermaid

If someone ever finds me, I'll have so many stories to tell.

Like that time I stared at the ocean for 20 years.

OK, I only have one story.

*uses the Force to search my feelings*

"404 error. Feelings not found."

This isn't an uninhabited planet.

I'm an inhabitant.

Don't I count?

Stupid question.

Of course not.

My uncle Owen said I would never amount  to anything.

Now I'm a hermit on an abandoned planet.

I guess I showed him.

Leia's father is dead, so when Han wanted to marry her, he asked me for permission.

I told him no.

I was holding out for Lando.
After 20 years of waiting here alone, maybe it's time to admit no one is going to jump out and throw me a surprise birthday party.

Sometimes I wonder if the ocean hates me back.

Then I remember that I poop in it.

It definitely does.

I played truth or dare with a rock.

I dared him to swim to the bottom of the ocean.

He never came back up.

If only he had picked truth.

The worst part wasn't when Yoda levitated my X-wing.

It was all the trash talking afterward.

It took forever because he talked backwards.

I have a girlfriend.

She lives on a different secret planet no one has ever heard of.

She's real.

And she has boobs.

Lots of boobs.

"Where are my friends?" I asked my uncle at my 5th birthday

"You don't have any," he said

"No, my imaginary friends"

"They said you suck"

⚪️ Single
⚪️ Taken
🔘 The last person I made out with was my sister.

Being alone all these years let me get to know the real me.

That was a mistake.

Now even I don't like hanging out with me.

[journal entry]

Day 7,328

Still lonely.

This is my 500th tweet.

I don’t want to waste it

I should say something important

I know I can do it.

Only a few characters left.

Damn.

I stare at the ocean.

It's blue.

Just like it was yesterday.

And all the days before that.

Pick a new color, ocean

You're phoning it in

Have you ever had a moment so awkward that you had to run away and become a hermit for the rest of your life?

Oh.

Just me, I guess.

Leia: Will you help the Resistance?

Me: Sure. I just have to do one thing first.

Leia: What?

Me: Run away to an island for 20 years.

I've never had a real pet.

But I had a Chia Pet once.

It ran away.

"I love you," I whisper.

The rock doesn't answer.

I should have known it was too soon.

I don't dwell on the events of 20 years ago

I don't even remember what I had for lunch

Wait, yes I do

It was moss

All I ever eat is moss

I have only one regret in my life:

I settled for cheap shampoo.

I'll never make friends with these split ends.

I brought only one thing with me to this island.

The Force.

But the Force is everywhere.

I didn't need to bring it.

I suck at packing.

Who let the dogs out?

No one.

No one let the dogs out.

I hope the dogs get out on their own.

I'd like to pet them.
The first rule of hermit club is if you join you get kicked out because you're not a hermit.

I'll never again feel the embrace of another human

Then again, I'll also never hear another teenager say "swag" or "yolo"

I came out ahead

I skipped a rock across the water too far for me to levitate back.

I feel terrible.

He was my best friend.

He had a family.

I would never strike someone with my robotic hand.

I don't care about making it a fair fight.

I just don't want to void the warranty.

The top 3 perks of being a hermit:

1) Lots of time to make lists.

2) I'm not sure what to put here.

3) Making lists is hard.

Sometimes I need emotional support.

But my friends are never there for me.

Rocks are bad at hugging.

As Darth Vader lay dying, he whispered his final words in my ear:

"Delete my Internet browser history"

That guy was into some weird stuff.

I spelled out "SOS" with rocks.

No one came.

Then I tried "Help me."

Still no rescuers.

Now it says "Free Beer."

How am I still here?

At least when my dad killed the younglings, he owned up to it, @KyloR3n.

Unlike someone I know, who said his lightsaber slipped.

37 times.

Very original, @KyloR3n.

Why don't you go build another Death Star?

I bet no one will blow it up this time.
